message.raw: @{557058:ba6a5dd6-99be-45af-a802-687b3318965a} The former Gazebo9 based simulation is now on a deprecated branch.  Therefore, if you are participating in the Subt Challenge Tunnel Circuit competition, then you should not be using the `*_gz.world` world files. The Ignition based simulation is the default recommended testbed.
message.html: @Reid Sawtell The former Gazebo9 based simulation is now on a deprecated branch. Therefore, if you are participating in the Subt Challenge Tunnel Circuit competition, then you should not be using the *_gz.world world files. The Ignition based simulation is the default recommended testbed.
